00029 #include "brisamulticasteventmessage.h"
00030 
00031 using namespace BrisaUpnp;
00032 
00033 BrisaMulticastEventMessage::BrisaMulticastEventMessage(
00034         BrisaStateVariable *variable, QString LVL, QObject *parent) :
00035         BrisaAbstractEventMessage(parent),
00036         variable(variable),
00037         SEQ(variable->getNextMulticastSeq()),
00038         LVL(LVL)
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 //TODO Use a real value for BOOTID.UPNP.ORG
00043 QHttpRequestHeader BrisaMulticastEventMessage::getMessageHeader() const
00044 {
00045     QHttpRequestHeader header("NOTIFY", "*");
00046 
00047     header.setValue("HOST","239.255.255.246:7900");
00048     header.setValue("CONTENT-TYPE", "text/xml");
00049     header.addValue("CONTENT-TYPE", "charset=\"utf-8\"");
00050     header.setValue("USN", this->variable->getMulticastUdn() + "::" +
00051                     this->variable->getMulticastUsn());
00052     header.setValue("SVCID", variable->getMulticastSvcid());
00053     header.setValue("NT", "upnp:event");
00054     header.setValue("NTS", "upnp:propchange");
00055     header.setValue("SEQ", QString::number(SEQ));
00056     header.setValue("LVL", LVL);
00057     header.setValue("BOOTID.UPNP.ORG", "");
00058     header.setValue("CONTENT-LENGTH", QString::number(
00059             this->getMessageBody().size()));
00060 
00061     return header;
00062 }
00063 
00064 QByteArray BrisaMulticastEventMessage::getMessageBody() const {
00065     QByteArray body;
00066 
00067     body.append("<?xml version=\"1.0\"?>\r\n");
00068     body.append(
00069             "<e:propertyset xmlns:e=\"urn:schemas-upnp-org:event-1-0\">\r\n");
00070 
00071     QString variableName = this->variable->getAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::Name);
00072     QString variableValue = this->variable->getAttribute(BrisaStateVariable::Value);
00073 
00074     body.append("  <e:property>\r\n");
00075     body.append("    <" + variableName + ">" + variableValue + "</"
00076             + variableName + ">\r\n");
00077     body.append("  </e:property>\r\n");
00078     body.append("</e:propertyset>\r\n");
00079 
00080     return body;
00081 }
